function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease transmission in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread among bank employees and customers","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting remote work, and using air filtration systems","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless payment systems","People":"Bank employees, customers","Owner":"Bank management, government health authorities"}]}
